fields.headline: 2006 World Cup draw - African zone
fields.bodyText: Second stage: Five groups of six teams play a league system on a home and away basis. Five group winners qualify. Group 1 Senegal, Mali, Zambia, Togo, Liberia, Congo Group 2 South Africa, Democratic Republic of Congo, Burkina Faso, Ghana, Uganda Cape Verde Islands Group 3 Cameroon, Egypt, Ivory Coast, Libya, Sudan, Benin Group 4 Nigeria, Zimbabwe, Algeria, Angola, Gabon, Rwanda Group 5 Tunisia, Morocco, Kenya, Guinea, Malawi, Botswana
